references: R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, E16.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=0..105
Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
maple: f := proc(n) option remember; if n = 0 then 95; elif f(n-1) mod 2 = 0 then f(n-1)/2 else 3*f(n-1)+1; fi; end;
prog: (Haskell)a008875 n = a008875_list !! na008875_list = drop 2 a008874_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 30 2012(MAGMA) [n eq 1 select 95 else IsOdd(Self(n-1)) select 3*Self(n-1)+1 else Self(n-1) div 2: n in [1..70]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jul 29 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: More terms from Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Apr 27 2001
